attributes.action: Help bring back the Home Nations Football Tournament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Help bring back the home nation's football tournament,as a proud Welshman I think the team and all teams could do with a competition with something to play for. Wales only have 2 competitive games a year then were knocked out!!As the 6 nations show the tournament brings everybody together and I fancy our chances against England!!
